Reviews.Title: “Staying at the star”
Reviews.Author: SenaLondon
Reviews.Content: Excellent location for walking to key historical sites, markets, eateries and hamams. Excellent tram and transport links. All the staff were friendly and accomodating. Brilliant breakfast to be had with brilliant views. Surprisingly quiet of traffic for such a central location. Family room for four was good for the price and we felt safe. Hotel airport transfers for a family of four is good value and encourages you to enjoy the local amenities.

Reviews.Title: “a great stay”
Reviews.Author: BarbaraS66
Reviews.Content: Many thanks to Altin and his staff for the great stay I had at Star Holiday Hotel. Location was perfect for visiting the Sultanahmet area, for taking public transport, for shopping and also for eating out. The street is full of restaurants, cafes and cake shops. I had a single room, with enough space for me and the bags, facing the inner part of the building, so no view but a perfect silence for sleeping. The room was cleaned every day and I had clean towels everyday. I did enjoy breakfast, with fresh cheese, tomatoes, olives..and a stunning view of the Blue Mosque and of Marmara Sea. I definitely recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “A honest review”
Reviews.Author: budget_travel101_12
Reviews.Content: great value for money hotel, great location as it is walking distance to tram, hagia sophia and blue mosque etc. great view while having breakfast on the 4th floor. downside= staff on the front desk are not that friendly and speaks only fair english. they seem not happy to help. do not take this hotels airport transfer they charged me double the price. i paid 20 TL but it only costs 10 TL from the same airport transfer facility company outside. try to compare prices first before taking the hotels services. Take a room facing the blue mosque as its window view. beware of room 402 as the people who are outside eating breakfast outside can almost see whats going on inside. Otherwise, this is just an okay hotel in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Location compensates for everything else!”
Reviews.Author: VKKapoor
Reviews.Content: The view of the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia while having your breakfast in the 4th floor balcony compensates for everything else (small crammed rooms, a miniature bathroom, no in-room tea coffee,etc). You can walk around the Sultanahmet area (or take the tram or the city sightseeing bus from just outside the Hotel) and return to the Hotel for an afternoon nap. The location alone is good enough to give a Very Good score to this centrally located property.

Reviews.Title: “You wont regret!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kanyta
Reviews.Content: I will be very short in my review and I ll tell you that you wont regret if you stay at this hotel,during your visit to Istanbul! A great terrace view from this hotel will take u breathless! You can see all Istanbul beauties such as Sultanahmet Blue Mosque,Marmara sea and actually a heart of this town! Accomodation is great,it has everything you need at one place. People at this hotel will make your stay at their hotel and town the most interesting and great vacation! So,when u decide to come to Istanbul,be sure that you wont make mistake if you choose as your accomodation right this hotel!! ENJOY YOUR STAY AT STAR HOTEL ISTANBUL!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Rashad" nice staff and great location"”
Reviews.Author: rashad_radan
Reviews.Content: It was my first time to stay at this hotel. I felt comfortable accommodation in all aspects where cozy hotel with remarkable clean room, rich breakfast, and exceptional location, all important historical monuments are near by this hotel. Caffee shops resturants and tram station are steps away from this hotel. Staff hotel are helpful espacially hotel management extending maximum cooperation regarding comfortable stay. I will return Istanbul next summer with my family and sure I will accommodate this hotel once again.

Reviews.Title: “â€œA Wonderful Stayâ€�”
Reviews.Author: NGill555
Reviews.Content: It was really a great experience to stay with very accommodative staff of â€œStar Holiday Hotelâ€�. No doubt their level of hospitality was excellent. My younger two years old son really enjoyed the stay. The hotel is at most convenient location to visit all around the spectacular Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Good location with stunning view”
Reviews.Author: Farah_19611993
Reviews.Content: Paranomic view of the Blue Mosque with less than 5 minutes walking to the Sultanahmet train stop. Located in the Sultanahmet area with many food outlets, shopping, local travel agents and main attractions of the area with easy accessibility by rail, taxi.....Room was clean and comfortable with friendly & helpful staff especially Mr Taner C'inar

Reviews.Title: “Great people, great location”
Reviews.Author: Seema K
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. I needed a last minute accommodation and found this hotel on a main road right in the middle of some of the best sights in Istanbul. It is literally steps from Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque as well as situated between many great restaurants and shops. The aspect of the hotel that was most unique is the friendliness of the staff. Before I even booked the room, staff members were happy to answer my questions about the area and provide insider information about traveling there. Their insight was invaluable. Altin Diko, the manager of the hotel, even went far out of his way to help me with visa issues I was having while there. He gave me a lot of advice and was extremely knowledgeable. The room was clean and comfortable, staff exceptionally friendly, and the next time I go to Istanbul I will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “A Fine Location in Old Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: tndancer
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week with a dance group. The location could not be better- literally just steps away from the major sites in the historic center, and there is a major tram line just out the front door. The manager was extremely helpful and friendly- he even took 15 minutes out of his very busy schedule one day to personally guide me to a pharmacy four blocks away where I could buy some rosewater. The views from the rooftop breakfast room are spectacular and the Turkish breakfasts were exceptional. Our room was clean and comfortable. The shuttle transfers to and from the airport were very easy.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for a group”
Reviews.Author: stefan f
Reviews.Content: We spent ages looking online for a place to bring our group of 25 people to for a 10 day experience of old Istanbul. We needed a central location, good value, helpful English speaking staff and clean rooms. We got all this and a lot more. The views from the breakast terrace are stunning. If you get up early you see the sunrise colouring the Bospherus behind minarets while Ä±n the foreground a clear and close view of the Blue Mosque set in the park. MEALS: We discovered that thÄ±s street, Divan Yolu, is the heart of the old city, and within two mins walk you get about 100 fantastic restaurants, each with their own special dishes as well as all the expected kebab options. Our favourites include steak with pistachio sauce, 'Sultan' chicken, a saffron mushroom and rice veggy dish served at Han restaurant (very attractive decor - where you see the women making trad pies) and a dessert called 'chÄ±cken breast' made from baked cream wÄ±th a caramelised skin whÄ±ch tastes of toffee. SIGHTS: More to the point we found ourselves plonk in the middle of all the most gorgeous and historic places and right by a tram stop. We could walk to most and get the tram (2 TL) to the others. MANAGER: The staff were friendly, English speakÄ±ng and helpful. The manager, Altin Diko, (as other reviewers have said) really puts himself out to meet your needs. Our needs were many. We wanted a varied evening programme for our group that was not touristic. Altin helped arrange a series of experiences that left every sense sated, with pick-ups taking us from the hotel to each venue and back. If you're curious about us and our friendly group see www.worldance.org (look at diary dates for coming trips). The experience surpassed our expectations in every way. It was going to be a one off group adventure, but now we're planning to return! Stefan and Bethan Freedman - Ipswich, Suffolk, UK

Reviews.Title: “Ideal holiday hotel”
Reviews.Author: Margaret L
Reviews.Content: I have just spent ten enjoyable days based at this hotel. It is clean and comfortable and serves a delicious breakfast. It is ideally situated for sightseeing. Staff are friendly and very helpful, giving advice on trips out and help with holiday problems.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and made our trip wonderful”
Reviews.Author: DeeSap
Reviews.Content: Star Holiday Hotel isn't the fanciest hotel on the block, but the location is unbeatable. Literally steps away from the largest attractions in Istanbul, Star Holiday was a great place for us to stay. It is right on the tramway and on a busy street, so noise can be an issue, but with a great air conditioner and windows shut, we had no trouble sleeping. The room was clean, if a bit basic. Not many amenities really. But we didn't exactly spend a lot of time in the room. At night, we sat on the terrace overlooking the Blue Mosque, during the day we were out and about town. We could go eat, go site seeing, or go shopping and within minutes be back at the hotel to clean up, drop off stuff, and sit for a minute. The location is perfect. If you are in town to see the sites and be in the middle of Istanbul, this is a great place to stay. Highly recommended. If you are a business traveller looking for a quiet place to get work done in your room, maybe not. There's a nice sitting room with drink service and, as mentioned, a spectacular terrace. Prayer call was a bit loud here in the morning, but it was a great alarm clock, so we got up early and didn't waste a second in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location and stunning views”
Reviews.Author: mikkelholm
Reviews.Content: If your main priorities is location this is a good option. Rooms are rather basic but you are right in the center of Sultanahmet close to Blue Mosque and Aia Sofia. Also a great rooftop terrace with stunning views of the Blue Mosque and Bosporus.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel but unhelpful concierge”
Reviews.Author: Artroid
Reviews.Content: I stayed there and the room was fine and the location was great in Sultanahmet, but I wanted some help from the concierge, Taner, and he pushed me off and was very unhelpful.

Reviews.Title: “The location is great!!!”
Reviews.Author: Daulet
Reviews.Content: It is close to main touristic site. It is also too close to tramway. However it was loud, and the room was hot. The receptionist was kind. If you plan for two day stay, it is good, but not more.

Reviews.Title: “excellent location, reasonable price, friendly staff, clean .”
Reviews.Author: maggy55_11
Reviews.Content: very nice hotel, good location, friendly staff, clean. lovely views from breakfast room. best point ideally situated.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Caroline_1012
Reviews.Content: We stayed six nights at the hotel. The room we had was basic but clean. The staff friendly. We paid 70 euro per night for a room with own shower and perfect location. What more can you expect for that price? The breakfast buffet (with yoghurt, bread, cheese, vegetables etc.) was served in a room with the most beautiful view over the Blue Mosque. We very much enjoyed our stay and would be happy to come back.

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel, dirty rooms, overpriced, shared prison style toilets”
Reviews.Author: DusJ1
Reviews.Content: Great view of the blue mosque at night. That's it. The rooms are disgusting, the staff are miserable, the price is too high, better off staying in a hostel. They put us in a room with a shared bathroom and I had to stand over the toilet to shower. Disgusting

Reviews.Title: “Unique hotel in an unforgettable city”
Reviews.Author: vaniabitzina
Reviews.Content: We spent a memorable four days at this hotel. In our point of which is positioned hotel is probably the best in Istanbul. Despite its central location is relatively quiet. The hotel rooms are bright and very cozy, almost like home. The restaurant is on the top floor of the hotel, with incredible panoramic views of historic landmarks. The staff at the hotel welcomed us as their friends are all extremely polite and helpful, and indeed remain your friends in the future. About us another wonderful thing was that the hotel is located 3-5 minutes walk from the famous historical sites in Istanbul, thanks to which we were able to visit them and even workshops that were involved. I would recommend this hotel to anyone surely will not regret it if you stay with them.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience is what this hotel is gives...”
Reviews.Author: ledi34
Reviews.Content: Going to Istanbul for a holiday was a blast. Staying over at the Star Holiday Hotel was one of my favorite hotel that I have ever stayed in. The location of the hotel is the best that you could find because it is right in the center of the main city. The view that you see from the hotel is a breathtaking, you could view the whole city from the top especially the blue mosque. Not only the view that you could see from the hotel that is great, but the service that the hotel provided was amazing, the people in the hotel are very friendly and the environment inside the hotel is magical. If I was lazy to go see the city, I would stay in the hotel for my whole holiday because the room was very beautiful and relaxing, not to mention that the cleanliness of the hotel is very excellent. The convenience of the hotel location is as great as it can be as bars and cafes and restaurant is just a foot away from the hotel, not to mention they are plenty of groceries nearby. If you want stay somewhere near the famous Turkish Bazaar, look no further as the Star holiday hotel is the right choice for you.

Reviews.Title: “Good position”
Reviews.Author: LoriTirana
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights and it was good experience, good position in city center, friendly staff, well cleaned, very nice view from the terrace. I will stay again in my next visit in Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “excellent location”
Reviews.Author: kasia_TA
Reviews.Content: One of the best location in Istanbul â€“ just opposite the Blue Mosque! Walking distance to main attraction of Sultanahmed. Room (shared bathroom) clean but small. Great view from restaurant on 4th floor. Good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Look somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: sushivibe
Reviews.Content: We were attracted to this hotel by the cheap rated and positive reviews. Nothing was as advertised, they did not show one room which had the nice bed frame and open space you see in the picture. Quiet rooms have view on a horrible building, while those with view on the Blue Mosque are noisy because of the tram directly in front. The sheets and towels had holes, the shower had only lukewarm water and only cold water in the minuscule sink. The 2 rooms we stayed in had bad smell from sewage. When we complained with the receptionists, they were totally aloof, they even said we should go to hamam if we lacked hot water. In a way, they hinted that for the price we payed (24 euros a night) we had no right to complain. When the manager returned from a weekend leave, things improved a bit and we were given some attention and a better room (still with smell and no sight of the nice beds used in the advertisement, but at least had hot water). It is true that location is great but how much can you suffer when on holiday?! Look elsewhere, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Pathetic Service; Rude Staff”
Reviews.Author: Maheenn
Reviews.Content: It was apalling to see the rudest bunch of Turkish people all working in teh same hotel; Star Holiday. The service was poor, and the staff was ill mannered. None of them were even helpful to serve the most basics of requirements. Despite staying in the hotel for minimal number of hours, our experience here was one I would never want again! Other than the poor level o service, the breakfast was stale with no variety. Please avoid staying at this place if you want to even remotely enjoy ur trip!

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: chanama
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel twice once in Last year and this year in October too with my friends and with my wife.. It is located in the right place from where you can go to see all the interested historical places.. no need any tram or bus or any other transport..Walking distance is just near... Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful with all the informations and the hotel is very cozy rooms are nice according to the standard .. ..One can have breakfast in the morning and cheer up to see the beautiful view of Blue mosque at the same time when having breakfast in the restaurant.. Restaurants are beside the hotel .Whenever I go to Istanbul would perfer to stay again in the same hotel., price is very reasonable.....

Reviews.Title: “A fantastic location for so many of Istanbul's famous attractions.”
Reviews.Author: OlgaRowles
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Star Holiday for 5 nights at the begining of Sept. Although our quadruple room was quite tight for space we never wasted a minute of our time in rushing outside to visit all the famous attractions right on our doorstep. Breakfast ( Turkish style ) was served on the top floor with a fabulous view of the Blue Mosque. The choice for eating out in the afternoon/evenings was excellent as was the shopping too. A big thank you to Mr. Altin Diko and his friendly staff and for his organising of a tour of the Bosphorus which we all thoroughly enjoyed. We will definately recommend this hotel to any of our friends and plan to come back some day very soon.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best choices in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: IngaLatvia
Reviews.Content: Istanbul Star Holiday Hotel is the one of the best choices how to save money, be satisfied and get fun of staying in Constantinopol :))) e.g. Istanbul. I am coming to Istanbul much and for 4 -5 years know how difficult is to get good value for spent money! star Holiday Hotel is that! All historical places are near, tram stop- 1 min, wonderfull view on Blue Mosque. Unbelievable nice in night! Good size of room what is very important for europeans. In Istanbul not in all hotels even 3-4 stars you cannt be sure of good room size. All what you see in web site is in reality and more better. and main- hotel staff, especially Altin- manager. Its most important- personal attitude! Great! May be for some people not so good seems noise from tram, but its not so much.

Reviews.Title: “An awsome location, great view and friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: carlorg
Reviews.Content: We booked a package that included flight and hotel and it was a very good decision to select this hotel. Despite the fact that the rooms are a bit small, they are comfy and clean. Breakfast was included and it was very yummy with a great view. The front desk people were very helpful, I will definitely recommend this hotel to friends and I will go back again

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: psoni
Reviews.Content: Right in between Hagia Sofia and Blue mosque. Very good place and nice price

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel in the heart of the old city”
Reviews.Author: Marina_22_07
Reviews.Content: I had a great stay in Istanbul in Star Holiday Hotel. The staff very friendly - starting with the warm welcome and help till the end of my stay. The breaksfast was good quality and the room lovely. Excelant location in sultan ahmed & close to the historical places & tram & everything )) Professional staff and especial - manager Altin Diko )) Always so kind, friendly and helpful!

Reviews.Title: “I was very pleased with this hotel”
Reviews.Author: AydinCologne
Reviews.Content: You cant find more suitable hotel than the Star Holiday in absolute centrum of Ä°stanbul

Reviews.Title: “music and show business”
Reviews.Author: BiellaGeorge
Reviews.Content: in this hotel the relation with customers is just wanderfull.....really remarquable!!!! Especially Mr.Altin....he wants help you until you are yourself satisfied!! Thanks again Star hotel and Mr. Altin!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Manager and Holiday”
Reviews.Author: SarthakSam
Reviews.Content: Even though its late but better late than never. I was traveling with my partner and friends and had a rough plan to travel around Turkey. We chose to start our stay with Hotel Star Holiday and visit Istanbul. One of our friend cancelled and we stayed a day less than a day expected. Even though it was start of high season, Mr Altin helped us accomodate our stay. He took a hit to cancel our room without any charge. When our last day was cut short ..he managed it leave that out as well. We are very thankful to him. The location of hotel is very conveinient being near to all tourist locations. One can find snacks from 1 EUR to the nicest hotel for the evening. Tram station is just across the street and sights are just 2-4 stops away. More than the hotel..Altin and his team made the place more memorable.

Reviews.Title: “"The Star Holiday, a wise choice"”
Reviews.Author: AlxBdrn
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed at the Star Holiday for 15 days, we had a very pleasant time, The hotel manager, was always there to assist us and tried to solve each one of our problems and special requests, treating us in a friendly way. The Hotel is 100% safe and has a privileged location, in the heart of Sultanahmed, just a few steps and there you are ! Its close to a lot of wonderful â€œmustsâ€� in Istanbul. If you need transportation, there is a train stop right across, everything that a tourist might need: is close to the hotel: travel agency, shops, pharmacy, currency exchange, laundry service, some â€œhammans â€� a lot of nice restaurants, convenience stores, etc. Prices are affordable and you can pay with cash or credit card, fare was a bit higher than our original budget ,but it worth every cent. The only unexpected thing, was the adjustment on the fare for Chrstmas. Our room was a bit small but was always clean , the sheets and towels were changed daily , the heater, tv , hot water, internet in the room and lobby worked properly, personnel is kind and helpful , always keeping a smile . You start your day with a nutritious breakfast at the cafeteria while enjoying a breathtaking view of the Blue Mosque, The Hagga Sophia the Marmara Sea and others. I hope I could go back to Istanbul soon, this time knowing that I will have a great place to stay, I definitely recommend it to my family and to everybody who wants to assure the best vacation ever !

Reviews.Title: “Starholiday !! Very Recommendable!!”
Reviews.Author: meminGuayaquil
Reviews.Content: Starholyday is a nice and pleasant place to stay into istanbul. My sister and I stayed for almost 2 weeks, and we highly recommed this hotel, cause everything is as they advertise, its accomodations, facilities, staff, specially its manager Mr. Altin who makes your stay unforgettable, because he checks , supervises that all is okay. Please go there , stay there , you won't regret. jorge CaÃ±izares S. Ecuador - South America

Reviews.Title: “Top location, clean, nice service, very friendly”
Reviews.Author: teacher_michael
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel could not be better. 2min walk to blue mosque, 2 min walk to Topkapi-palace, 2 min walk to Yerebatan cistern and 2 min walk to the next tram-station. To walk down (nice morning walk) to eminÃ¶nÃ¼ where all ships are starting to ÃœskÃ¼dar, KadikÃ¶, Bosporus-tour, EyÃ¼p takes 15 min. This in combination with nice beds to sleep and a daily cleaning-service would be enough to recommend the hotel. But in addition the breakfast-area is at the 4th floor including excellent view to the blus mosque, marmara sea and incoming ships to the bosporus. I always use this in the evening to chill down, drink beer, make fotos, write emails, talk to other guests and use the WLAN of the hotel... I will continue to come there...

Reviews.Title: “We will definately come back!!!”
Reviews.Author: Turkan17
Reviews.Content: I often travel to istanbul and have stayed in a few hotels near the Star Holiday Inn, But this is the only hotel that i would most definately come back to. I have read the review that the hotel was dirty and the staff was not friendly, to which i would like to say,,RUBBISH! The manager of the hotel along with his staff were very friendly and polite, ready to assist you at any time. The hotel is having a facelift, so ofcourse it would look like the carpets needed hoovering, but in all truthfullness this is not a fault. The location of the hotel is A+,, the amazing view of the blue mosque and its surrounds whilst having breakfast is fantastic ,the only downside was that the breakfast area was abit small. This is a central city hotel with everything at its feet, anyone wanting luxury,redcarpet or a doorsman should be looking for a 5 star hotel. Id like to thank everyone at the Star for making my stay there very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “clean comfortable beds, plenty of hot water.”
Reviews.Author: lifestooshort29
Reviews.Content: stayed here over the weekend, and it was perfect for our needs. we wanted a good central base from which to sightsee, we didn't intend to spend hours in the hotel. the beds were comfortable, the sheets crisp and clean. ok, the room was small but we didn't spend any time there so it was no problem, when you're asleep the room size is not important! we found the staff pleasant and helpful, the lounge, where we waited for our transfer after we checked out several hours before, was a perfect place to wait. the only thing that wasn't so good was the size of the breakfast area, there aren't enough tables to cater for more than 9 sets of guests at a time, this could be a problem at busy times, but then again, people soon move, no one wants to spend hours over breakfast when the blue mosque and all the other important sites are luring you out. the view from the breakfast room is incredible, you couldn't be closer to the historic centre. if you want a spa hotel and a luxury break choose another hotel, but if you want a good base and clean and comfortable accomodation at an affordable price this hotel is idea.

Reviews.Title: “I felt like home”
Reviews.Author: Starseedancer
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a very warm place, it has a privilgileged location, its in a nice area, there are rooms for evreyone needs, the personnel of the hotel is ready to help you and satisfy your requirements .Breakfast is served in time, the beds are turned down daily , you can breath cleanliness :) there is always somebody cleaning the floors, the tables, chairs, windows, etc. The Manager is a gentleman who speaks a lot of languages, which is a great advantage for tourists who come from different parts of the world, not everybody in Istanbul is bi or multilingual, Mr Altin is ready to help, assist., find solutions, give a recommendation or suggestion to his guests who are treated like friends, in this way everybody is happy and have a pleasant stay. We congratulate Mr. Altin for excellent managing of the Starholiday Hotel and for making us forget that we were staying at a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Basic but Good”
Reviews.Author: Yenism
Reviews.Content: We choose to stay here because the location looked quite good, when we arrived the location certainly didnt disappoint. The views was brilliant, and although the breakfast was basic, you soon get use to it and the the view over looking the two mosques was a super plus. Rooms were however very small and everything in the rooms seems a bit of mismatch, toliet/shower were really small. So if you are looking for something nice, then this is not it. But if its just a good firm bed your looking after then this is great. Also try the kebab place next door, it really is nice, simple but nice! One thing i would add, if you can i wouldnt bother with any taxis or hotel transfers to the airport, we got on the train, which stops near to the hotel... we saved a few pennies there!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: Kuzmi4
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife stayed in this hotel in September, 2008. Location of the hotel is super, but rooms are too small. you cannot imagine how the rooms are small. the breakfast is basic. The personal are very friendly and helpful. I had high temprature when I arrived the hotel and my wife could not find any available drug-store around. But administration of the hotel helped with an Aspirin tablet. THANKS A LOT!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and interesting prices.”
Reviews.Author: MMHN
Reviews.Content: Very good and safe location with Ã  beautiful view from the breakfast room. The breakfast is also correct. Tiny and noisy rooms (a little less at night) but mattress very well. Bathroom not very well cleaned, valves to change. Staff correct. Beware of the proposed shuttle service to go to the airport. It tells you 30 minutes to get to the airport, it takes 1 hour instead, because before heading to AtatÃ¼rk, the shuttle circled the area until EminÃ¶nÃ¼ to take other passengers, a cold sweat if you have provided time accounted for your flight.

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: margarette
Reviews.Content: This is a basic budget 2 star hotel and its location just yards from the blue mosque more than makes up for the lack of amenities. The view from the breakfast room is amazing and the same from the lounge which is on a lower floor. There is no lift so not suitable if you have mobility problems as 4 floors to walk up. The rooms are very small as is the bathroom and the towels could definately do with replacing. However the beds are clean and comfortable and made up each day. The TV has no English channels so not worth watching. There is also a fridge although we didn't use it and adequate hanging and drawer space. The breakfast is rather basic - bread rolls - cheese - meat - jam - boiled eggs - tea and coffee but for the price is sufficient for the day. The hotel is quiet at night except for the call to prayer at 5am but this must be the same for every hotel in this area and it only lasts for 5 minutes. All in all if you get the hotel for a good price you will find its location very good and if you are not expecting too much it is fine for a short stay. I was there for 4 nights in March and the weather was much the same as in England at this time of the year and the sites not too busy.

HotelInfo.Name: Star Holiday Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Divanyolu Caddesi 10, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
